original_title: Gli appunti di Anna Azzori / Uno specchio che viaggia nel tempo
overview: Shot from 1972-75, Anna observed a young drug addict expecting a child. Ruhmâ€™s essay film draws on this previous work and asks about the place of women in a world that was full of discrimination back in the 70s and remains so today.
title: The Notes of Anna Azzori / A Mirror that Travels through Time
